sentences.en: Brian's face balled up like a fist.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩的脸鼓得像个拳头。

sentences.en: Dooley stood up and shook his fist in her face.
sentences.cn: 杜利站起身，在她眼前挥舞着拳头。

sentences.en: Gary clutched a penny in his fist.
sentences.cn: 加里将一枚便士攥在手中。

sentences.en: He pounded the table with his fist.
sentences.cn: 他用拳头猛击桌子。

sentences.en: He punched me with his fist.
sentences.cn: 他用拳头猛击我。

sentences.en: He raised his right fist and declaimed: "Liar and cheat!"
sentences.cn: 他举起右拳高喊：“骗子，骗子！”

sentences.en: He reckoned he should make a better fist at farming than educating.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己搞农业会比教育更成功.

sentences.en: He smashed his fist into Anthony's face.
sentences.cn: 他一拳打在了安东尼脸上。

sentences.en: He struck me with his fist.
sentences.cn: 他用拳头打我.

sentences.en: He suddenly shot out his fist.
sentences.cn: 他突然打出一拳.

sentences.en: Mahoney clenched his fist in exasperation.
sentences.cn: 马奥尼恼怒地攥紧拳头。

sentences.en: Malcolm clenched his fist (= held his fist very tightly closed ) angrily.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆愤怒地握紧拳头。

sentences.en: My fist glanced off his jaw.
sentences.cn: 我的拳头斜擦着他的下巴而过。

sentences.en: My son had a tantrum and banged his fist on the ground.
sentences.cn: 我儿子大发脾气，一拳捶在了地上。

sentences.en: She held the money tightly in her fist.
sentences.cn: 她把钱紧紧地攥在手中。

sentences.en: She shook her fist. "I'll show you," she said.
sentences.cn: 她挥了挥拳头，“我要让你看看，”她说。

sentences.en: She strode towards them, her fist upraised.
sentences.cn: 她举着拳头，大步迈向他们。

sentences.en: The soldier gave the clenched-fist salute.
sentences.cn: 士兵行握拳礼。

sentences.en: they're all solid citizens, all capable of making a good fist of being an MP.
sentences.cn: 他们都是好公民，都能胜任下院议员的工作。

sentences.en: Varney slammed his fist down onto the table so hard the dishes jumped.
sentences.cn: 瓦尼一拳砸在桌子上，盘子都给震了起来。

phrases.tran_cn: 平稳快捷地；[口]不费力地；[口]（尤指钱）大量地

trans.tran_en: the hand when it is tightly closed, so that the fingers are curled in towards the  palm  . People close their hand in a fist when they are angry or are going to hit someone.
